resources.string: MobiRizer is a global company creating entertaining games and application for mobiles.We provide specialized service for mobile application development in iPhone, Android, J2ME, Windows and Symbian, native as well as hybrid, in enterprise product development, mobile web development, software testing and games development.

Smart Invitation App is a modern way to send invitations to your friends and relatives.Where user get almost 6 category of celebrations.And each category will have 15 Card Designs. User can edit them by adding text and cute stickers in it.Its a very user friendly app which does not make user confuse.
